text: Na kabhili gunishibhwene shindu mbuti bhaali ja shiyoo, jiengenywe na moto. Gunaabhwenenje kabhili bhandunji bhankombwelenje nnyama alugwilwe lina lyakwe kwa jene eshabhu jila, na shanamu shakwe. Bhene bhandunji bhajimingene nnyenje bhaali ja shiyoobho, bhalinginji na ingushingushi ibhapegwilenje na a Nnungu.
